Summary: what first appeared as a plane, which i lost view of, then appeared as a disk shaped ufo.
divs: sighting detailsat about 8-9pm.(edt)my brother and i were heading to a friendly poker game at a friends home. after stoping at a stop light facing south, roughly 1 mile from the destination. looking south\east, i spoted a glaring orb, light orange in color that first looked like a plane over the house lines, i then strangely realised that it was not blinking its routine lights. as we began driving down south i lost sight of the ufo. and then we arrived at the home. we parked infront on the curb, facing west. as i got out and turned around to face east, i spotted something far and above, from what it looked like, it was the rear view of a low plane heading away from me,which had red like lights which was normal for aircraft at this area. i then quciky realised it was not a plane nor a man made vehicle. the ufo was disk shaped with like i mentioned red lights with glaring black lights pulsating in the ring of the disk. the ufo appeared to be about 10k away and 10k high. it didnt move for the entire duration, it remained in one spot. as me and my brother stood there i told my brother if he can see that and he shrugged it saying yea', we then stood for 1 min just staring at it. i quickly called both friends to come out and view this ufo. as they came out we were all in awe of being in the presense of a ufo. we didnt feel anything physical as we just stood and look at it debating whether were tripping. it then lightly vanished to the stars as we lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around January 12th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
